title.rendered: NEWTECONS WAS AWARDED BEST COMPANIES TO WORK FOR IN ASIA IN 2021

content.rendered:
Recently in Singapore, Newtecons and more than 100 Vietnam based companies were honored as Best Companies to Work for in Asia 2021, an annual award held by HR Asia – a leading journal on Human Resources in Asia.

This award recognizes Newtecons’ progress of actively engaging employees, teams and leaders; executing outstanding personnel policies and attractive compensation and welfare policies and regularly organizing appealing team building activities. HR Asia appreciates Newtecons’ flexibility in facing and dealing with obstacles and uncertainties during the pandemic, especially when social distancing continues to disrupt business on global scale.

 

HR Asia’s survey result revealed vigorous efforts and unyielding spirit of all employees toward  common goals. Most of interviewees chose answers such as “We are willing to support our colleagues when they need our help”, “I will strive harder to achieve common goals of the company”; “I am constantly looking for ways to improve my performance and contribute to this organization.”

 

During straight 18 years of establishment and development, Newtecons has strived to affirm its position as the No. 1 General Contractor in Vietnam, appreciated trust and integrity as core values to attract talents and encourage our people to dedicate at their best for the ultimate benefits of our society. We have built a corporate culture based on 5 core values: Integrity – Unity – Trust – Optimization – Creativity. At the same time, we have built an unique working environment according to 6 principles: Transparency – Fairness – Cooperation – Sincerity – Enthusiasm – Professionalism.

 

Newtecons is known as one of the companies with best working environment and employee benefits policies in construction industry, and was voted by HR Asia Award as one of the best companies to work for in Asia for many consecutive years. Each employee always considers the success of Newtecons as the success and legacy of their own, thus never stop learning and developing themselves.

 

Thousand days in one direction, thousands of people with one heart, all employees consider Newtecons as their second family, commited and dedicated to deliver their best performance and together reach new heights in their career.  Not only focus on business scale, we always set business goals  next to the mission of creating value for partners, clients and society, and at the same time build a fulfilling working environment for our people.
